pos_mean_info_list.mean: 改进；增加（improve的过去式和过去分词）；变得更好
有启发的；有教育意义的
即兴创作；临时做，临时提供（improvise的过去分词）
可改良的；可利用的；可改善的；可更好的
即兴创作；即兴表演；临时凑合
即兴创作；即兴表演；临时做；临时提供

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多用于口语，指适当地改善原来并非很差的状态或性质，也指社会地位、经济状况的改善。
最常用词，多指状态或性质上的深刻或重要改进，也可指自身能力的提高。
语义强，通常指使方法、技术等达到完善美好的境地。
侧重指使语言、仪态等变得文雅、优美，也可指技艺等的提高。

word_group.brief_definition: 改进和完善；完善提高；健全和完善

bilingual.source: Betty thinks (that) trees can improve the air.
bilingual.target: 贝蒂认为树可以改善空气质量。

bilingual.source: Running could improve and help him treat his asthma.
bilingual.target: 跑步可以改善并帮助他治疗哮喘。

bilingual.source: Setting good ground rules can improve learning for everyone.
bilingual.target: 制定好的基本规则可以改善每个人的学习。

bilingual.source: Economic development is necessary if we want to improve society.
bilingual.target: 如果我们想改善社会，经济发展是必要的。

bilingual.source: These gardens have helped make the cities greener and improve air quality.
bilingual.target: 这些花园帮助城市变得更绿并改善空气质量。

bilingual.source: Now people are using laughter to improve their health in countries all around the world.
bilingual.target: 现在人们在世界各地用笑来改善健康。

bilingual.source: Think about the changes you would suggest to the head teacher to improve your school.
bilingual.target: 想一想你会建议校长做哪些改变来改善你的学校。

bilingual.source: I only joined my local athletics club because my doctor told me that in my particular case exercise could improve how my lungs work.
bilingual.target: 我加入当地田径俱乐部只是因为医生告诉我，在我的特殊情况下，锻炼可以改善肺功能。
绿化可以改善空气质量。

yingyinNormal.en: It'll also help improve her initial impression of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这同时也能改善你在她心目中的最初印象。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, I don't think me getting on your back is gonna improve matters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不认为让你来背我能改善现在的情况。

yingyinNormal.en: Apprehending the man in the mask will improve Hiro's emotional state.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓住那个戴面具的男人，可以改善小宏的情绪。

yingyinNormal.en: If you could acquire this ability, and with practice you can, you will radically improve your life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有了这种能力，再加上实战演练，你就能极大地改善自己的生活。

yingyinNormal.en: Will terminating Professor Callaghan, improve your emotional state? Yes. No. I don't know. Open your access.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杀死卡拉汉教授就能改善你的情绪吗? 是的，不是，我不知道，打开你的端口。

yingyinNormal.en: New CDC guidelines and outreach is helping hospitals improve training and protect their health care workers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 新的疾控中心指导手册和升级的防护标准正在帮助各医院改善培训水平，并保护他们的医护人员。

yingyinNormal.en: If you recognize when we make cognitive mistakes, when we fall short, we can actually think about how to improve the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你意识到你的认识什么时候会出错什么时候会达不到目标，我们就能够着手思考怎样来改善这个世界。

yingyinNormal.en: There's more. The applications go beyond the disease. There are indications that show that therapy can improve cognitive functioning, memory quality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有这种药物的作用已经不止于治病，有迹象表明该疗法能改善认知机能和记忆质量。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: What they had was dopa-responsive dystonia. And so they were given L-Dopa, and their symptoms did improve, but they weren't totally asymptomatic. Significant problems remained.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多巴反应性肌张力失常。所以采用L－多巴治疗，他们的病情确实有所改善，但是并没有完全消除。仍然存在严重的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: They said it would improve the park experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们说，这样能提升游园体验。

yingyinNormal.en: The other nurse, Amber Vinson, continues to improve as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一名护士，安伯.文森，也继续在康复过程中。

yingyinNormal.en: And of course she must improve her mind by extensive reading.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且她一定通过广泛的阅读 来扩展他的视野。

yingyinNormal.en: When everyone is dead? That is not! The human race will have every opportunity to improve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当所有人都死了的时候吗？那不是！人类有无数机会去进步。

yingyinNormal.en: Take it from me, listening to criticism is never fun, but it's the only way we can improve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 毫无疑问，听人批评绝对不会让人高兴。但我们只能在批评中进步。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: You see, I want to improve how we sell our grain. If I make a good case for it, he'll agree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如我想改进我们卖粮食的方式，如果我说得够有道理，他就会同意。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, hey, hey! Come join the improve club. You'll wish you were a... Never... Always... Ah, dang it!
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎加入即兴表演社。你会希望曾是…从不…总是…啊，可恶

yingyinNormal.en: You don't get better if you win all the time. You know, you get better when you lose. You improve when you lose. You look at yourself more when you lose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你一直赢，你不会成长，只有失败才会让你成长，失败让你提高，失败让你更加反思自我

yingyinNormal.en: So today, what's my call to action? I want to help improve and promote the cultural exchange between the East and West I think I have made that clear, but how?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以今天，我要呼吁什么？我想要加强东西方之间的文化交流，这点已经很清楚了，但是如何做到？

yingyinNormal.en: But to us, it's all about trying to identify and cut out as much waste as you can to lower your costs and improve the efficiency and the speed by which you do your work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是对于我们来说，都是在识别以及去掉尽可能多的浪费来降低成本和提高效率和你工作的速度。

yingyinNormal.en: Sometimes terrible things happen to all of us in life. They can ruin us, or they can profoundly improve us depending on how we handle them. Something like this happened to me in 1982.
yingyinNormal.zh: 生活中我们都可能遇到可怕的事。这些事要么会毁了我们，要么让我们更强，都看我们怎么处理。1982年我就遇到这这种事。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 改善; 增进; 提高

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 自我提高；自我改进；自我完善
n. 进步的实例；改善；进步；增进；帮助改善之物

word_family.mean: v. 改善；增进；改进；发展；提高

sense_info_list.en: to become better than before; to make something/somebody better than before
sense_info_list.zh: 改善; 增进; 提高

examination_example.sentence: But policymakers who refocus efforts on <highlight>improving</highlight> well-being rather than simply worrying about GDP figures could avoid the forecasted doom and may even see progress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果政策制定者将努力重点放在改善福利而不是仅仅担心GDP数据，那么他们可能会避免预测中的厄运，甚至可能会看到进展。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, being grateful for small things every day is a much better way to <highlight>improve</highlight> wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，对每天的小事心存感激是一个更好的提高幸福感的方法。

examination_example.sentence: The Web-based program allows you to systematically <highlight>improve</highlight> your memory and attention skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个基于网络的课程可以系统地提高你的记忆力和注意力。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 否定前缀, 表示"不, 无"

sample.mean: adj. 证实的；证明的
v. 责备；非难
v. 批准；同意；认可；证明；显示；称许
v. 证实；证明；发酵；证明是；显示出；结果是；证明（遗嘱）的真实性和有效性；原来是；显示（自己的）才干

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 进步的实例；改善；进步；增进；帮助改善之物

word_family.mean: v. 改善；增进；改进；发展；提高

sense_info_list.en: develop or increase in mental capacity by education or experience

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps, if we continue to <highlight>improve</highlight> information-processing machines, we'll soon have helpful rational assistants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们不断完善机器处理信息的能力，用不了多久我们就可能会拥有“理性的”得力助手。

examination_example.sentence: We want to <highlight>improve</highlight> the quality of animal health and make it easier for farmers to maintain large landscapes where animals roam free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望提高动物健康的质量，让农民更容易维护动物自由漫步的大片土地。

examination_example.sentence: Since 2007, economic welfare in the U.S. has continued to <highlight>improve</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自2007年以来，美国的经济福利持续改善。

examination_example.sentence: It's actually a kind of support because it's offered in the spirit of helping us <highlight>improve</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那实际上是一种支持，因为它是以帮助我们进步的精神提供的。

examination_example.sentence: Cultivating drawing talent can become an essential tool to <highlight>improve</highlight> people's observational skills in fields where the visual is important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在视觉重要的领域，培养绘画才能可以成为提高人们观察能力的重要工具。

examination_example.sentence: It helps <highlight>improve</highlight> concentration and memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有助于提高注意力和记忆力。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多用于口语, 指适当地改善原来并非很差的状态或性质, 也指社会地位、经济状况的改善。
最常用词, 多指状态或性质上的深刻或重要改进, 也可指自身能力的提高。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 进步的实例；改善；进步；增进；帮助改善之物
v. 即席创作表演；凑合出…

word_family.mean: v. 改善；增进；改进；发展；提高

sense_info_list.en: develop or increase in mental capacity by education or experience

examination_example.sentence: A review of 54 studies found that eating breakfast can <highlight>improve</highlight> memory, though the effects on other brain functions were inconclusive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一篇对54项研究的文献综合分析发现，吃早餐可以改善记忆，但对大脑其他功能的影响尚无定论。

examination_example.sentence: According to the same study, efforts to reduce consumption should focus on <highlight>improving</highlight> consumer awareness and behaviour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据同一项研究，减少微波炉用电的努力应聚焦于提高消费者意识、改善其消费行为。

examination_example.sentence: One of the review's researchers, Mary Beth Spitznagel, says there is "reasonable" evidence breakfast does <highlight>improve</highlight> concentration 一 there just needs to be more research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该论文的作者之一 Mary Beth Spitznagel 表示，有“合理的”证据表明，早餐的确可以提高注意力，只是还需要更多的研究。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers argued that breakfast helps reduce daily calorie intake and <highlight>improve</highlight> the quality of our diet — since breakfast foods are often higher in fibre and nutrients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，早餐有助于减少每日卡路里的摄入量，改善我们的饮食质量，因为早餐吃的东西往往含有更高的纤维含量和营养成分。

examination_example.sentence: The core idea of making is to have an idea within your head and begin to develop it, repeat it and <highlight>improve</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创造的核心理念在于脑袋里要有一个想法，然后开始开展它，重复它并改进它。

examination_example.sentence: Transitions between stages could be marked with sabbaticals (休假) as people find time rest and recharge their health, re-invest in their relationships, or <highlight>improve</highlight> their skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 休假可能会标志着各个阶段之间的过渡，因为人们需要找时间休息、休养、重新投资人际关系，或提高自己的技能。

examination_example.sentence: As driver less cars <highlight>improve</highlight>, they will save lives. They will make fewer mistakes than human drivers do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着无人驾驶汽车的改进，它们将挽救生命。与人类驾驶员相比，他们犯的错误更少。

examination_example.sentence: She was designed to slowly <highlight>improve</highlight> her ability to handle conversations, but some people were teaching Taylor racist ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的设计是为了慢慢提高自己处理对话的能力，但有些人却向泰勒传达种族主义思想。

examination_example.sentence: While preparing to teach, they organize their knowledge and <highlight>improve</highlight> their own understanding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在备课的同时，他们梳理知识，增进理解。

examination_example.sentence: For another, they present the project with a funny video because good visuals and a sense of humor <highlight>improved</highlight> success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，他们用一个有趣的视频展示这个项目，因为好的视觉效果和幽默感增加了成功的概率。

最常用词，多指状态或性质上的深刻或重要改进，也可指自身能力的提高。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 改善; 发展; 提高

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 进步的实例；改善；进步；增进；帮助改善之物

word_family.mean: v. 改善；增进；改进；发展；提高

sense_info_list.en: develop or increase in mental capacity by education or experience
sense_info_list.zh: 改善; 发展; 提高

examination_example.sentence: Discussing your issues and resolving them instead of stuffing them down can <highlight>improve</highlight> your emotional health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 讨论并解决你的问题，而不是压抑它们，可以改善你的情绪健康。

examination_example.sentence: Here are some tips to help <highlight>improve</highlight> your reading speed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有一些技巧可以帮助你提高阅读速度。

examination_example.sentence: He spent time <highlight>improving</highlight> his painting skills and began to sell his paintings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他花时间提高自己的绘画技巧，并开始出售他的画。

examination_example.sentence: Your productivity is <highlight>improved</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的工作效率提高了。

v. 责备；非难

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多用于口语，指适当地改善原来并非很差的状态或性质，也指社会地位、经济状况的改善。
最常用词，多指状态或性质上的深刻或重要改进，也可指自身能力的提高。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 改进; 改善; 提高

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 自我提高；自我改进；自我完善
n. 进步的实例；改善；进步；增进；帮助改善之物

word_family.mean: v. 改善；增进；改进；发展；提高

sense_info_list.zh: 改进; 改善; 提高

examination_example.sentence: It also helps to <highlight>improve</highlight>  the relationship among people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这也有助于改善人与人之间的关系。

examination_example.sentence: Keeping English diary is a good way to <highlight>improve</highlight> English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写英语日记是提高英语的好方法。

examination_example.sentence: If you have these habits, your memory will <highlight>improve</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你有这些习惯，你的记忆力会提高。
